name: Fix WeaviateVectorStore missing text_key argument
objective: Resolve the TypeError caused by a missing 'text_key' argument during WeaviateVectorStore initialization.

tasks.prompt: Locate the instantiation of WeaviateVectorStore in the codebase.
Update the WeaviateVectorStore instantiation to include the 'text_key' argument.
Verify the fix by running the application.
